name: ai-cover-letter-generator
description: Chrome extension that generates personalized cover letters from job descriptions using OpenAI and Claude AI

scripts.dev: echo 'Load extension in Chrome developer mode - see README.md for setup'
scripts.test: echo 'Manual testing required - see support page for test checklist'
scripts.lint: echo 'Manual code review - follow style guide in CONTRIBUTING.md'
scripts.package: npm run clean && npm run build && npm run create-zip
scripts.create-zip: zip -r ai-cover-letter-generator-v$(jq -r '.version' manifest.json).zip manifest.json popup.html options.html js/ css/ icons/ -x '*.DS_Store' '*/.DS_Store' '*/Thumbs.db' '**/*.log' '**/*.tmp' '**/*.backup' 'icons/*.svg'
scripts.clean: rm -f *.debug.md test-storage.js DEBUG.md GENERATION_DEBUG.md INSTALLATION.md INSTRUCTIONS_FOR_IMPROVEMENTS.md PERSISTENCE_TESTING.md STORAGE_QUOTA_FIX.md
scripts.prepare-release: npm run package && echo 'Extension packaged and ready for release!'
scripts.validate: jq . manifest.json > /dev/null && echo 'Manifest JSON is valid'

author: netors

manifest.name: AI Cover Letter Generator
manifest.description: Generate personalized cover letters from job descriptions using AI

features: Works on all major job sites
